alert.note: Alert for McKean; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 9:59PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WARREN AND MCKEAN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 957 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Letchworth State Park to 23 miles southeast of Erie and moving east at 40 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Lottsville and Garland around 1020 PM EST. Youngsville around 1030 PM EST. Warren, Warren South and Chapman State Park around 1040 PM EST. Scandia around 1045 PM EST. Kinzua Dam around 1050 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
